name: **Rossmore Island**
description: Rossmore Island V756-657 Sheet 84 Joined to the mainland by road, this is a very private island in the sense that, notwithstanding the OS, the road never accesses the seashore anywhere around the island, and the landowners do not encourage visitors. Those who drive onto the island must drive back off. Do not easily stir off the public road. Those who wish to explore its shoreline can embark from a beautiful quay just off the Ring of Kerry road at V744-656 in the middle of Coongar Harbour.
